note: Not currently used by any entities within Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. In its place, the parameter `can_break_doors` has been added to the `minecraft:navigation` component to allow entities to break down doors.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Break Door Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows this mob to break doors.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
